children.value:
This is a minor release with several stability and convenience improvements since the
large refactoring that happened in v0.6.0. It adds a few new layout elements, the ability
to pre-initialize cells when starting thebelab, and adds configuration and
documentation for deploying your book on Netlify.
[WIP] Add option to clear outputs in build command
fix: fuzzy matching of jupyter book versions
moving CSS and JS generation to their own function
small refactoring of names and layout
moving js outside of _includes if not needed
modularizing the bage building and beefing up single page building
DOC: intro.md: Jupyter Books -> Jupyter Book
making some files optional in upgrade
Contributors for this release (commentors + issue/PR authors)
